title: Spacious 1 Bedroom 1 Bath with Washer/ Dryer!!!  Apply Today!!!
posting_body: ['At 2900 Lux, comfort and convenience go hand in hand.', 'Between our two swimming pools, the outdoor lounge with grilling stations, the bocce ball court, and the inviting clubhouse, theres always something to choose from.', 'Challenge yourself at the fitness center, relax on the beautiful sundeck, or spend some time with your furry friend at the pet park.', 'We also provide workspaces with iMacs, to help you focus and stay on top of your work at all times, and laundry facilities, for maximized efficiency.', 'When its time to rest, we have splendid one, two, and three-bedroom homes that welcome you with comfort and sophistication.', 'Our Las Vegas, Nevada, apartments for rent come with everything you need to lead a carefree lifestyle, including spacious closets, air conditioners, patios/balconies, and practical appliances.', '-Black Appliances', '-Built-In Microwaves', '-Clubhouse with Entertaining Kitchen', '-Mosaic Kitchen Back Splash', '-Convenient', 'Onsite Laundry', '-Sundecks with Patio Furniture', '-Resident Work Space with iMacs', '-Dishwasher', '-Online Maintenance Request', '-Bocce Ball Court', '-Community Controlled Access/Gated', '-Air Conditioner', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Pricing and availability are subject to change.', 'Contact leasing office for details.']
